## Overall Itinerary (scroll down) {.scrollable}

* Paris (3x nights)
  * Train to Giverny
* Giverny (1 night)
  * [The Hermitage Bed and Breakfast](https://giverny-france.com/hermitage.htm)
    * 17th century Norman manor 
    * $130/night including breakfast for 2
  * 20 minute walk to Monet's gardens
  * 25 minute walk to Vernon
  * Train to Rouen
* Rouen (just passing through)
  * Rent car
  * Joan of Arc square
  * Cathedral
  * Drive to Etretat
* Etretat (just passing through)
  * Moderate 2.6 mile hike to see ocean cliffs
  * Pebble beach
  * Chapelle Notre-Dame-de-la-Garde
  * Les Jardins d’Étretat
  * Drive to Honfluer
* Honfluer (2x night) 
  * Drive to Mont Saint Michel
* Mont Saint Michel (1x night)
  * Drive to Dreux
* Potential stops along drive to Dreux
* Dreux
  * Return car
  * Chateau d'Anet
  * Train to Paris
* Paris (1x nights)
